class.name: DiscordVADThresholdSettings
class.brief_description: Settings for the void auto detection threshold for picking up activity from a user's mic.

method.name: automatic
method.description: Whether or not Discord is currently automatically setting and detecting the appropriate threshold to use.

method.name: vad_threshold
method.description: The current void auto detection threshold value, has a range of -100, 0 and defaults to -60.
